generated_description: peverelli, legally known as the peverelli company, is a high-end furniture company based in bulgarograsso, lombardy. established in 1949 by giulio peverelli, the company has over 70 years of experience in the design and sale of furniture. peverelli specializes in the selection and design of furniture for exclusive interior projects, offering a comprehensive service that includes the management and realization of interiors for some of the most prestigious residences worldwide. the company is known for its expertise in combining modern and antique styles, and it collaborates with architects and designers to create unique and customized environments. peverelli has expanded its presence internationally, with showrooms and flagship stores in various locations, including lugano and milan.
